A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I feel like I have just watched the most expensive piece of fan fiction ever made. Sure\, it's impressive to look at but there's so many questionable situations\, deus ex machina moments - not to mention one of the poorest decisions regarding a characters story arc I've ever witnessed. For all its flaws\, Force Awakens is still infinitely more rewatchable than this movie is. Was I watching a different movie than the movie critics?
